titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Finding aid prepared by Brian Carpenter

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-09-13T21:12-0400

did.unittitle: Panamint language recordings
did.abstract: Linguistic field recordings, recorded at Ridgecrest, California in 1983. Elicited vocabulary and grammar, with English glosses and frequent commentary on Panamint history and customs. Includes an interview with the consultant by a newspaper reporter on his life and local history.
did.physdesc: 9 sound cassettes (7 hr., 50 min.) : analog, 1 7/8 ips, stereo.

originalsloc.head: Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Audiocassette copies or original tapes prepared the Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted access. Requires permission of Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Archival Materials
relatedmaterial.p: The researcher's transcripts from these recording sessions and notes on tape duplication from Berkeley Language Center are available in the Phillips Fund Collection (Mss.497.3.Am4).

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Presented by David Shaul in 1987 (Acc. 1987-854r) in the form of audiocassette copies of original tapes prepared by the Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. This material was recorded with the assistance of a Phillips Fund grant.

did.unittitle: Audio recordings
Elicitation of numbers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Original tapes held at Berkeley Language Center, University of California, Berkeley. Formerly numbered 1:1.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.
